items.title: Venezuela live updates: Trump says US is 'in charge' of Venezuela
items.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

items.title: WATCH:  Police officers rescue boy from icy pond
items.description: Officers rescued an 8-year-old boy after he fell through the ice on a pond on Long Island, New York, on Christmas Day.
